tool_description: Analyzes fulfillment performance at the product level, identifying which products have fulfillment challenges, storage requirements, and packaging complexities that impact delivery metrics.

performance_dimensions.description: Dimensions to analyze: processing_time, packaging_time, shipping_success, return_rate, damage_rate

weight_size_impact.description: Analyze impact of product weight and dimensions

error_messages: Invalid product categories: Some specified categories do not exist in the catalog
Invalid SKUs: Some SKU identifiers are not found in the system
Invalid performance dimensions: Use combinations of [processing_time, packaging_time, shipping_success, return_rate, damage_rate]
Insufficient product data: Some products lack sufficient order history for analysis
usage: Optionally filter by product_categories or specific sku_list, select performance_dimensions to analyze, and configure additional analysis options for detailed product-level insights.
